pullRequest.title: Enable bootstrap repository creation for openSUSE Leap 15.2 for Uyuni
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
Enable bootstrap repository creation for openSUSE Leap 15.2 for Uyuni
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: Not needed for now. Leap 15.2 is not supported officially as it's not released.


 DONE


Test coverage


No tests: To be tested by cucumber in the future.


 DONE


Links
Nothing

 DONE

Changelogs

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)
Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
